title: John Bercow – 2021 Comments on Joining the Labour Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by John Bercow, the former Speaker of the House of Commons, on 20 June 2021.
content: I am motivated by support for equality, social justice and internationalism. That is the Labour brand. The conclusion I have reached is that this government needs to be replaced. The reality is that the Labour party is the only vehicle that can achieve that objective. There is no other credible option.
